FuncDef: This command configures a revert timer on an LSP. The timer starts when the LSP primary path recovers from a failure. The LSP reverts from a secondary path to the primary path when the timer expires, or when the secondary path fails.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the amount of time, in one minute increments, between attempts to re-establish the LSP after it has failed. Allowed values are integers in the range of 0 to 4320. Values-0 to 4320.
